titleStmt.title: The Christian manuell, or of the life and maners of true Christians. A treatise, wherein is plentifully declared, how needefull it is for the seruaunts of God to manifest and declare to the world: their faith by their deedes, their words by their works, and their profession by their conuersation. VVritten by Ihon VVoolton minister of the Gospel, in the Cathedral church of Excetor.
titleStmt.author: Woolton, John, 1535?-1594.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I[ohn] C[harlewood] for Thomas Sturruppe dwelling in Paules Church yarde, at the singe [sic] of the George,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped along top edge, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church yarde, at the singe [sic] of the George
